example_name_request:
Examples: 

• 10% off on price

• Discounted e-bike renting

• 1 hour of free parking
no_request:
There are no offers for this POS.
Create one by tapping on the + button.
wom_age_suggestion: Indicates the maximum age, in days, of accepted WOM.
wom_age_warning: By not using the filter we accept WOM of any age.
insert_value_grather: Insert values greater than 0 and lower than 1000
insert_service_price: The number of WOMs required to access the offer
aim_suggestion: Select the type of WOM required to access the offer.
aim_warning: If you do not specify any aim, you will accept WOMs of any kind.
no_connection_desc: To accumulate or consume WOMs your device needs to be connected to the internet
no_connection_aim_desc:
Since this is the first time launching the app you need an active internet connection to download all necessary data for configuring your POS. 
Turn your network data on and click "Retry"
no_connection_transaction_desc:
To generate a payment request your device needs to have an active internet connection. 
Turn your network data on and click "Retry"
no_pos_alert:
Attention you have no POS
Press the button below to create a POS
selection_pos_suggestion: Tap here to select the POS to manage
welcome_desc: With this instrument you can set discounts and concessions that you want to offer to whoever has done socially useful actions.
merchant_desc:
To generate offers on your behalf you must be registered as a Merchant.
If you haven't already, register now or proceed anonymously
wom_desc: Most individual actions generate social value. This value is quantified in terms of WOM, special vouchers included in the list of social and digital innovation instruments of the European Commission.
wom_suggestion_desc: Since every WOM is equivalent to one minute of commitment, you can freely decide how many WOM are needed to earn your offers.
no_merchants: You don't have any Merchant paired with your account. Log in via the web and add a Merchant
login_insufficient_pos: The login was successful but there are no Merchants or POSs registered for this account!
